prompt: Subject: The Woman. Context: Sun-drenched art studio with golden hour light, cozy and lived-in set design (e.g., paintbrushes, half-finished canvases, warm-toned furniture). Action: Looks up slowly from her sketchbook, fingers pausing on the page, then turns her head to gaze out the window with a thoughtful, slightly distant expression, comfortable in solitude. Style: Soft, warm, cinematic aesthetic. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow tilt up from the sketchbook (focus on her hands) to her face (eye level), then gentle pan right to frame the window as she gazes outward. Composition: Close-up on her hands and sketchbook, transitioning to a medium close-up of her face, then medium shot including the window. Ambiance: Golden hour sunlight flooding the studio, warm earthy color palette (terracottas, soft yellows, muted greens), soft and introspective tone.
camera_movement: slow tilt up, gentle pan right
label: story
